channel.title: VirtualBox on Code and Loathing
channel.description: Recent content in VirtualBox on Code and Loathing

item.title: Installing DOS 6.22 from MSDN
item.description: Install MS DOS 6.22 from MSDN into VirtualBox VM If you have a Visual Studio subscription, formerly known as a MSDN subscription, you may have noticed that MS DOS is available as a download. The following is instructions on how you can install the provided MS DOS 6.22 download into a new Virtual Box VM. Steps Download and extract DOS 6.22 Download the MS DOS 6.22 download from your Visual Studio subscription.

item.title: Connect Putty to Serial Port on VirtualBox guest using a Named Pipe
item.description:
This post describes how to connect to a serial port on a VirtualBox guest VM using PuTTY.

The serial console has traditionally played a special role in system configuration, administration and recovery. Access through this method may provide special elevated privileges and/or not have the same authentication requirements as access through other means.
